name: Astro (itch) (Fire Dev, ComplexMatter)
description:
There are millions of stars out there and it's your task to find out which ones can actually inhabit life. You can use a satellite dish, your computer and a knowledge book to research the stars.

Ahum, due to some miscalculations, there is a 0.022% change you can actually find a star with a planet that's habitable. Good luck!

KNOWN BUGS

-In the control panel, the sensitivity slider overlaps with the exit button (red). You can still press the exit button at the top and the bottom.

-When you have locked on a star, the satellite dish will freak out (and the camera as well).

-When you unlock the satellite, the text displaying whether the satellite dish is locked, doesn't update (still says it's locked).
